availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Levi B. Whittaker (Shelby County, Kentucky, blacksmith)

body.p: Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth Sharpe. Father of Sarah Whittaker, Mary Whittaker, [Unknown] Whitaker, James Whittaker, Hannah Whittaker, [Unknown] Whittaker, Maria Whittaker, John Whittaker, and [Unknown] Whittaker. Blacksmith in Shelby County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Shelby County, District 2, p. 146.
Kentucky, Birth Records, 1847-1911, Shelby County Births, November 26, 1853, p. 4 (accessed via ancestry.com).
